Documentation for d1_common_python - DataONE Common¶

d1_common_python is a DataONE client library written in Python. It provides functionality commonly needed by projects that interact with the DataONE infrastructure via Python. It is a dependency of d1_libclient_python, Generic Member Node and all other DataONE components written in Python.

d1_common_python is a part of the DataONE Investigator Toolkit (ITK), and is developed as part of the DataONE project.
